duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in directing the activities and staff within the C&F Manage operations including Finishing Products, safety of the work force, and the quality of work being produced.
Ability to tolerate both high and low temperatures, loud noises typical of a manufacturing plant.
Activate the potential of our people, caring for our customers, optimizing operations and integrating sustainability into our daily practices.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Manufacturing or related field (Master's preferred)
